title: Dying of the Light
itunes:title: Dying of the Light
description:
Restaurant napkins, extravagance when a meal goes wrong, and food sharing are discussed. The hags explore the unfolding of a cup of coffee and impermanence. Kate had a meal ruined. The common cold, vocal rest, leftovers, and doomsday bunkers are considered. Kate’s worrying about EMFs. Jacqueline is obsessed with the Costa Concordia disaster. Nazi game play and presence of The Holocaust in the Jewish home. 

.

.

.

.

.

This episode was edited and engineered by C. Tweedie.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
